nodes.text: Photomorph was an electronic entertainment device that took a photo of a user's face, then allowed them to distort the image in amusing ways. Several Photomorph booths were located in Astroport Interstellar Services at a Star Tours spaceport.
Real Photomorph booths were found at the Astroport Interstellar Services arcade area, located after the exit of the original Star Tours ride at Disneyland Paris from 1993 to 2005.
